channel.title: The Demake on TooNormal
channel.description: Recent content in The Demake on TooNormal

item.title: The Monday Report: Boxing Day 'Dead Health Potion' Edition
item.description: Uh… I am concerned about what that potion would do to me if I drank it. (a typo/bug from today, hehe) Hello! This is quite possibly the last post I’ll do in 2011, so lets make with the goods! This past week I’ve continued working on the demake of my primary project. If you checked out the Ludum Dare prototype, the core mechanics have dramatically improved since then (about 4 days ago).

item.title: Ludum Dare Prototyping
item.description: I wont talk too much about how Ludum Dare itself went, as I’ve already done that over here. But in addition to running the event, I participated for the first time in a long time. The theme was â€œAloneâ€œ, which I find funny given the title of my game. Could I not enter? ðŸ˜‰ About a week before Ludum Dare, I started toying with the idea of creating a demake of my game.
